channel.title: Broadcast access point issue
channel.description:
So I got LAN and WAN running on Speedify https://ibb.co/R6C9cdb
But I can only get 2.4 GHZ to broadcast. Not the 5 GHZ. I don't have a 2.4 hotspot to join but if I enter a value there as client on 2.4ghz and enable it, I would also lose the 2.4ghz access point. ![Screen Shot 2024-05-17 at 5.09.44 AM|690x361](upload://lAetQ96LFcvDDoquVqr7kaBjWx8.png)
I added two networks on 2.4ghz access point. Is this how you get the combined wired and wireless sources to work? https://ibb.co/72phX1G The only problem is that every time I change some setting in wireless, Wlan0 would drop from speedify and sometimes do not reappear unless I do a fresh install of smoothWan.

item.title: Broadcast access point issue
item.dc:creator: nilreb
item.description:
after messing with it more, Wlan0 or xfinitywifi in my case at 5ghz now reconnects itself to speedify but only if I turn off 5ghz access point. I cannot have both hotspot and access point at the same time.

I have both att and xfinity so I will try replacing xfinitywifi with att wifi later on. The only difference is, att does not have captive portal because it’s my router. I will remove the router password and leave it open like xfinity.

Read full topic

item.title: Broadcast access point issue
item.dc:creator: TalalM
item.description:
You’ve done everything correct, this is a bug that has been reported by few others and I have yet to reproduce, will reply here on any findings.

Read full topic

item.title: Broadcast access point issue
item.dc:creator: nilreb
item.description:
So I got LAN and WAN running on Speedify

ImgBB

Screen-Shot-2024-05-17-at-5-01-57-AM hosted at ImgBB

Image Screen-Shot-2024-05-17-at-5-01-57-AM hosted in ImgBB

But I can only get 2.4 GHZ to broadcast. Not the 5 GHZ. I don’t have a 2.4 hotspot to join but if I enter a value there as client on 2.4ghz and enable it, I would also lose the 2.4ghz access point.

I added two networks on 2.4ghz access point. Is this how you get the combined wired and wireless sources to work?

ImgBB

Screen-Shot-2024-05-17-at-5-13-26-AM hosted at ImgBB

Image Screen-Shot-2024-05-17-at-5-13-26-AM hosted in ImgBB

The only problem is that every time I change some setting in wireless, Wlan0 would drop from speedify and sometimes do not reappear unless I do a fresh install of smoothWan.

Read full topic
